title: SEC Asserts Ripple XRP Case was 'Wrongly Decided', Signals Appeal
description: Terra’s lawyers cited the Ripple XRP ruling in their latest filings, but the SEC says the ruling actually favors them.

title: What UK inflation data reveals about the economy’s future
description: As the dust settles on the latest financial statistics, it’s clear that the UK’s economic future may be starting to find firmer ground, as evidenced by a discernible shift in inflation rates. The annual inflation rate plummeted to 7.9% in June, a breath of fresh air amid the ongoing cost of living crisis, and a ... Read more

title: Avalanche Price Prediction 2023-2032: Time to Buy AVAX?

title: Ethereum-Based Decentralized Finance Protocol Loses $3,260,000 in ETH to Hackers
description:
A decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol built on top of the smart contract platform Ethereum (ETH) has been hacked to the tune of about $3.2 million. New data reveals that Conic Finance (CNC), which provides omnipools, or liquidity pools that allow all trades on a network to occur in a single transaction, to Curve Finance (CRV) […]
